divs: Sighting DetailsWife and I both saw the same light from two separate points about 2 miles apart. Looking southeast from East Wallingford Vermont. Saw bright bullet-shaped light with small spray of light below, like a flood light. Flood light effect expanded lowrer, then bright light went out while flood light slowly faded. Duration 1-2 minutes. Object appeared stationary. much larger than any planet or star except the moon (not visible at that time).
Summary: Bright Cone Shaped light with spot light effect below
